author: mharwood
msg: Fix for a potential null-pointer-introducing bug which came about as part of the DocIdSet changes. TermsFilter no longer implemented bits(IndexReader) and the Filter base class' version of this was changed to return null.

When dropping 2.4 Lucene in as a direct replacement for 2.3.2 my client code was getting NullPointer errors - returning null was never part of the Filter.bits contract and so this could be a problem for others using this class.
Fix is for TermsFilter to implement bits(IndexReader) - this can safely be removed in later versions because it is a deprecated method going forward.

author: ddam
msg: - add property "isIdAttribute" on AttributeDef, used during addition of Entities in ldap, to fill an ldap attribute with the entity's ID. E.g. the inetOrgPerson ldap schema requires an SN attribute (SN = SurName). In  the default configuration (see security-ldap.xml), the sn attribute will be set to the principal's ID.

author: sisbell
msg: Put back in repository helper due to problems of building with clean repo.
